channel.title: Yuma County|Arizona|United States on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Yuma County|Arizona|United States on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: I-8 East Approaching Exit 78
item.description: I-8 east approaching Exit 78 - Spot Road.

item.title: I-8 East - Exit 73
item.description: I-8 east at Exit 73 - Aztec Road.

item.title: I-8 East - Exit 67
item.description: I-8 east at Exit 67 - Dateland

item.title: I-8 East - Exit 54
item.description: I-8 east at Exit 54 - Ave 52E/Mohawk Valley.

item.title: I-8 East - Exit 42
item.description: I-8 east at Exit 42 - Ave 40E/Tacna

item.title: I-8 East - Exit 37
item.description: I-8 east at Exit 37 - Ave 36E/Roll.

item.title: I-8 East - Exit 30
item.description: I-8 east at Exit 30 - Ave 29E/Wellton.

item.title: I-8 East Approaching US Border Patrol Inspection Station
item.description: I-8 approaching the US Border Patrol Inspection Station, east of Yuma. The station was closed at the time this picture was taken.

item.title: I-8 East Approaching US Border Patrol Inspection Station
item.description: I-8 east approaching the US Border Patrol Inspection Station. The station was closed at the time this picture was taken, and another station was set up about 50 miles east of here.

item.title: I-8 East - Exit 14
item.description: I-8 east at Exit 14 - Foothills Blvd.

item.title: I-8 East - Exit 12
item.description: I-8 east at Exit 12 - Fortuna Road.

item.title: I-8 East - Exit 9
item.description: I-8 east at Exit 9 - BL-8/Avenue 8 1/2 East.

item.title: I-8 East - Exit 7
item.description: I-8 east at Exit 7 - AZ-195/Araby Road. AZ-195 is being constructed as an alternate route between Yuma and the San Luis Port of Entry at the Mexico border. Currently only a few miles of this route is complete.

item.title: AZ-280 North at I-8
item.description: AZ-280 north at I-8. Use I-8 west for San Diego. Use I-8 east for Phoenix and Tucson.

item.title: AZ-280 South
item.description: AZ-280 south along Ave 3E in Yuma.

item.title: I-8 East Exit 3 Offramp at AZ-280
item.description: I-8 east Exit 3 offramp at AZ-280 south.

item.title: I-8 East - Exit 3
item.description: I-8 east at Exit 3 -AZ-280 South/Ave 3E

item.title: I-8 East - Exit 2
item.description: I-8 east at Exit 2 - US-95/16th St.

item.title: I-8 East - Distance Marker
item.description: Upcoming exits on I-8 east - 16th St./US-95, Ave 3E/AZ-280, Araby Road.

item.title: I-8 East Approaching Exit 2
item.description: I-8 east approaching Exit 2 - US-95 jct. Use US-95 for San Luis, Yuma Proving Ground, and Quartzite.

item.title: I-8 East - Welcome To Arizona
item.description: I-8 east - Welcome To Arizona. The welcome sign is about a mile inside of Arizona after Exit 1. There is a smaller welcome sign on the Colorado River bridge at the actual state line.

item.title: I-8 East - Exit 1
item.description: I-8 east at Exit 1 - Redondo Center Drive/Giss Parkway. This is the first Arizona exit along I-8. Approaching the Arizona Port of Entry.

item.title: I-8 East - Yuma Exits
item.description: Upcoming exits on I-8 east in Yuma - Redondo Center Drive/Giss Parkway, Weigh Station, 16th St./US-95.

item.title: I-8 East - Arizona State Line
item.description: Arizona State Line, Yuma County Line, and Yuma City Limits on the Colorado River bridge at the Arizona-California State Line.

item.title: I-8 East - Colorado River
item.description: I-8 east at the Colorado River. The Colorado River marks the boundary between California and Arizona.

item.title: AZ-280 South at I-8 Exit 3 Onramp
item.description: Begin of AZ-280 south at I-8 to San Diego, Phoenix, and Tuscon.

item.title: I-8 West - Distance Marker
item.description: Next 3 exits on I-8 west, BL-8, Araby Rd., and AZ-280

item.title: I-8 West - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on I-8 west to CA-186, El Centro, and San Diego just east of Arizona-California Line

item.title: I-8 West - Exits 2 and 1
item.description: I-8 west at Exit 2 - US-95/16th St., and approaching Exit 1 - Giss Parkway

item.title: I-8 West - Welcome To California
item.description: Welcome To California/Imperial County Line on the Colorado River on I-8 west at the Arizona line.

item.title: I-8 West Distance Marker
item.description: I-8 west next 3 exits: AZ-280, US-95, and Weigh Station

item.title: I-8 West Exit 1 (Arizona) - Exit 172 (California)
item.description: I-8 west at Exit 1, Giss Parkway. The highway passes over the Colorado River in the background of this picture crossing into California. The next exit on the sign is California Exit 172 BL-8/Winterhaven/4th Ave

item.title: I-8 West Exit 2
item.description: I-8 west approaching Exit 2, US-95. Use Exit 2 for US-95/Quartzsite/San Luis.

item.title: I-8 West Exit 3
item.description: I-8 west at Exit 3 - AZ-280 South/Ave 3E

item.title: I-8 West Exit 3
item.description: I-8 west approaching Exit 3, AZ-280. Use Exit 3 for Yuma Intl. Airport/Marine Corps Air Station/Yuma Co Fairgrounds

item.title: I-8 West Exit 3 Offramp
item.description: I-8 west at Exit 3 offramp at AZ-280, To US-95.

item.title: I-8 West Exit 7
item.description: I-8 approaching Exit 7, Araby Road, 1 Mile

item.title: I-8 West Exit 7
item.description: I-8 west approaching Exit 7, Araby Road, 1/2 mile

item.title: I-8 West Exit 9
item.description: I-8 west, Exit 9 services

item.title: I-8 West Exit 9
item.description: I-8 west approaching Exit 9: BL-8/Ave 8 1/2 E/Yuma, 1 Mile

item.title: I-8 West Exit 9
item.description: I-8 west at Exit 9, BL-8/Ave 8 1/2 E

item.title: S. Fortuna Road at I-8 Exit 12 Onramp
item.description: Fortuna Road south at I-8 west to San Diego (CA) and east to Phoenix and Tuscon.

item.title: US-95 South - Distance Marker
item.description: US-95 south to Yuma Proving Ground and Yuma
